 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרַר‎</span>] **verb denominative Hiph\`il** ==suffer distress== (specifically of travail, compare [[Jer.4.31|Jer 4:31]]; [[Jer.49.24|Jer 49:24]]); — ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵב אִשָּׁה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצֵרָה‎</span> (in simile) [[Jer.48.41|Jer 48:41]]; [[Jer.49.22|Jer 49:22]]. 

 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרַר‎</span> **verb** ==shew hostility toward, vex== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַר‎</span> ***foe***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***harm, damage***, Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֿר‎</span> ***war, foe*** [[BDB#Mordt|Mordtm]]<sup>Him. Inschr. 60. 71</sup> [[BDB#SabDenkm|SabDenkm]]<sup>24</sup> [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv. 174, 1. 6</sup> [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chrest. 125</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be hostile***, in derived species and derivatives; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ƒarâru***</u></abbr>, ***be hostile***, <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ƒarru***</u></abbr>, ***foe***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ƒirritu***</u></abbr>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, all = ***rival-wife***, so (? Hebrew influence) [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרָא‎</span> [[1Sam.1.6|1Sam 1:6]] see especially [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Deceased Wife's Sister, GGN. 1882, No. 13; = Mi. 125ff.</sup> [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>[[1Sam.1.6|1Sam 1:6]]</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְצָֽרֲרוּ‎</span> [[Num.33.55|Num 33:55]] consecutive, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְרָרוּנִי‎</span> [[Ps.129.1|Ps 129:1]]; [[Ps.129.2|Ps 129:2]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָצֹר‎</span> [[Isa.11.13|Isa 11:13]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרוֺר‎</span> [[Num.25.17|Num 25:17]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹרֵר‎</span> [[Num.10.9|Num 10:9]], plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹרֲרי‎</span> [[Ps.31.12|Ps 31:12]] +, etc.; — ***shew hostility toward, treat with enmity, vex, harass***, with accusative of person [[Isa.11.13|Isa 11:13]]; [[Num.10.9|Num 10:9]]; [[Num.25.17|Num 25:17]] once with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person v[[Num.25.18|Num 25:18]] also participle as substantive (construct or with suffix) ***vexer, harasser***, [[Amos.5.12|Amos 5:12]]; [[Isa.11.13|Isa 11:13]]; [[Exod.23.22|Exod 23:22]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Ps.6.8|Ps 6:8]]; [[Ps.7.5|Ps 7:5]]; [[Ps.7.7|Ps 7:7]]; [[Ps.8.3|Ps 8:3]]; [[Ps.10.5|Ps 10:5]]; [[Ps.23.5|Ps 23:5]]; [[Ps.31.12|Ps 31:12]]; [[Ps.42.11|Ps 42:11]]; [[Ps.69.20|Ps 69:20]]; [[Ps.74.4|Ps 74:4]]; [[Ps.74.23|Ps 74:23]]; [[Ps.143.12|Ps 143:12]]; [[Esth.3.10|Esth 3:10]]; [[Esth.8.1|Esth 8:1]]; [[Esth.9.10|Esth 9:10]]; [[Esth.9.24|Esth 9:24]]. — [[Lev.18.18|Lev 18:18]] see [ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרַר‎</span>] below II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרָה‎</span>, below 



 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרַר‎</span>] **verb denominative** ==make a rival-wife==; — 

**Qal** ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִצְרֹר‎</span> [[Lev.18.18|Lev 18:18]] ***to make*** [her] ***a rival-wife*** ([[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>GGN, 1882, 406</sup> [[BDB#Dr-Wh|Dr-Wh]]<sup>Lv</sup> [[BDB#Baen|Baen]]<sup>l. v</sup>).
